title: Audi India bats for reduced GST of 5% on EVs till penetration in luxury vehicles reaches 50%
description: India currently levies GST of 5%, plus cess, on hybrids. The tax incidence on hybrid vehicles in the country totals 43%, while battery electric vehicles attract a tax of about 5%.
